questions_and_answers.question: When was the Department of Information Science & Engineering established?
questions_and_answers.answer: The Department of Information Science & Engineering was established in the year 1999. For further details please visit https://nmamit.nitte.edu.in/department-information-science.php#Overview

questions_and_answers.question: What is the initial intake of students in the Department of Information Science & Engineering?
questions_and_answers.answer: The initial intake of students in the Department of Information Science & Engineering was 40. For further details please visit https://nmamit.nitte.edu.in/department-information-science.php#Overview

questions_and_answers.question: How many students can the Department of Information Science & Engineering accommodate now?
questions_and_answers.answer: The Department of Information Science & Engineering can accommodate 180 students now. For further details please visit https://nmamit.nitte.edu.in/department-information-science.php#Overview

questions_and_answers.question: What is the purpose of the Information Science course?
questions_and_answers.answer: The Information Science course provides a comprehensive understanding of the principles, theories, and practical applications that form the foundation of Information Science. For further details please visit https://nmamit.nitte.edu.in/department-information-science.php#Overview

questions_and_answers.question: What are the fields that the Information Science course covers?
questions_and_answers.answer: The Information Science course covers the principles, theories, and practical applications of computer science, mathematics, and engineering. For further details please visit https://nmamit.nitte.edu.in/department-information-science.php#Overview

questions_and_answers.question: What is the role of Information Science Engineering in the digital world?
questions_and_answers.answer: Information Science Engineering plays a pivotal role in the increasingly digitized and interconnected world, influencing the way we communicate, process information, and make decisions. For further details please visit https://nmamit.nitte.edu.in/department-information-science.php#Overview

questions_and_answers.question: What facilities does the Department of Information Science & Engineering provide?
questions_and_answers.answer: The Department of Information Science & Engineering provides state-of-the-art facilities for learning, research, and hands-on exploration in the dynamic field of computer science. For further details please visit https://nmamit.nitte.edu.in/department-information-science.php#Overview

questions_and_answers.question: How does the Department of Information Science & Engineering maintain connections with industries?
questions_and_answers.answer: The Department of Information Science & Engineering maintains strong connections with industries by facilitating internship opportunities for students. For further details please visit https://nmamit.nitte.edu.in/department-information-science.php#Overview

questions_and_answers.question: How do industry partnerships benefit students?
questions_and_answers.answer: Industry partnerships provide students with real-world exposure, bridging the gap between academic learning and industry demands. For further details please visit https://nmamit.nitte.edu.in/department-information-science.php#Overview

questions_and_answers.question: What is the track record of the Department of Information Science & Engineering in terms of placement?
questions_and_answers.answer: The Department of Information Science & Engineering has placed 80-85% of qualifying students in reputable industries, demonstrating a good track record of placement. For further details please visit https://nmamit.nitte.edu.in/department-information-science.php#Overview

questions_and_answers.question: What is the vision of the Department of Information Science & Engineering?

questions_and_answers.question: What is the mission of the Department of Information Science & Engineering?
questions_and_answers.answer: The mission of the Department of Information Science & Engineering is to provide outstanding education and research training to the students for their productive careers in industry, academia and government, promote active learning, critical thinking, and engineering judgment coupled with business and entrepreneurial skills, and prepare the students to practice their professions competently to meet the ever-changing needs of society and to continue learning their discipline, allowing them to move into other related fields. questions_and_answers.question: What are Dr. ASHWINI B's educational qualifications?
questions_and_answers.answer: Dr. ASHWINI B holds a Ph.D. from VTU Belagavi in 2019, an M.Tech in Computer Science from VTU (Autonomous) in 2011, and a B.E. in Information Science and Engineering from VTU in 2004.

questions_and_answers.question: What are Dr. ASHWINI B's areas of interest?
questions_and_answers.answer: Dr. ASHWINI B's areas of interest include Image Processing, Computer Vision, and Machine Learning.

questions_and_answers.question: What are Dr. ASHWINI B's departmental responsibilities?
questions_and_answers.answer: Dr. ASHWINI B serves as the Head of the Department from August 2023 onwards, a Team Member of Project Vriddhi by Nitte University, UG coordinator for 5 years, Department placement Coordinator until August 2023, and Vista Coordinator for 2 years.

questions_and_answers.question: What professional memberships does Dr. ASHWINI B have?
questions_and_answers.answer: Dr. ASHWINI B is a member of IEEE, WIE, and serves as an Executive Committee member of the IEEE Mangalore Subsection.

questions_and_answers.question: What subjects has Dr. ASHWINI B handled?
questions_and_answers.answer: Dr. ASHWINI B has handled subjects such as Java Programming, Mobile application Development using Android, Algorithms, Operating System, Business Intelligence, Data Mining, Software Engineering, and Machine Learning.

questions_and_answers.question: What are Dr. BALASUBRAMANI R's educational qualifications?
questions_and_answers.answer: Dr. BALASUBRAMANI R holds a Ph.D. in Information Technology from Vinayaka Missions Research Foundation (Deemed-to-be-University), Salem in 2011, an M.Tech in Information Technology from Allahabad Agricultural Institute (Deemed-to-be-University), Allahabad in 2005, and a B.E. in Electronics and Communication Engineering from Madurai Kamaraj University, Madurai in 1990.

questions_and_answers.question: What is Dr. BALASUBRAMANI R's past experience?
questions_and_answers.answer: Dr. BALASUBRAMANI R has extensive experience including roles such as Professor of ISE, Facility Incharge, Chief Project Leader of EDC & STEP, Executive Head of MSME Business Incubation Centre, Head of the Department of ISE, Associate Professor of ISE, Assistant Professor of CSE, and Assistant Professor of IT at various institutions. Additionally, he has worked as an Intern at EmconEmsys Technologies Pvt. Ltd., Chennai, Senior Faculty at Microtech Computers, Pudukkottai, and Service Engineer at Puresine Electronics, Bangalore.

questions_and_answers.question: What are Dr. BALASUBRAMANI R's areas of interest?
questions_and_answers.answer: Dr. BALASUBRAMANI R's areas of interest include Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Deep Learning, Image Processing, Data Science, Data Mining, Digital Transformation, Digital Marketing, Digital Entrepreneurship, and Education Technology (Outcome Based Education).

questions_and_answers.question: What are Dr. BALASUBRAMANI R's departmental responsibilities?
questions_and_answers.answer: Dr. BALASUBRAMANI R serves as a Professor in the Dept. of Information Science & Engineering, Facility Incharge of Nitte Startup Ecospace Institute, NBA (National Board of Accreditation) Coordinator, Faculty Sponsor of ACM Student Chapter, Faculty Incharge of Development Students Club (DSC) supported by Google Developers, and Faculty Incharge of Salesforce Students Community. Additionally, he is a Faculty SPoC of ICT Academy, UiPath Academic Alliance Campus Advisor, Educator for Google for Education, Google Cloud, and UiPath, Coordinator for Faculty SIG on Data Science & Big Data Analytics (DS & BDA), Social Media Coordinator of NMAMIT Institute Innovation Council (IIC), and member of various boards and committees within the Information Science and Engineering Department.

questions_and_answers.question: What professional memberships does Dr. BALASUBRAMANI R have?
questions_and_answers.answer: Dr. BALASUBRAMANI R is a member of International Association of Engineers (IAENG), Indian Society for Technical Education (ISTE), Association for Computing Machinery (ACM), Chartered Management Institute (CMI), Institute for Engineering Research and Publications (IFERP), Institute of Data Science and Artificial Intelligence (IDSAI), and is a Certified IonCUDOS Subject Matter Expert for Outcome Based Education.

questions_and_answers.question: What subjects has Dr. BALASUBRAMANI R handled?
questions_and_answers.answer: Dr. BALASUBRAMANI R has handled subjects such as Robotic Process Automation Design & Development (UiPath Studio), Architecting with Google Compute Engine (Google Cloud), Data Mining, Software Engineering, Object Oriented Analysis & Design with UML, Computer Networks, Computer Organization and Architecture, OOPS using C++, Java Programming & Web Technology, Programming and Data Structures using C, TCP/IP Design & Implementation, Digital Image Processing, Advanced DBMS, Advanced Java Programming, Essentials of Information Technology, Business Intelligence & its Applications, Building Enterprise Applications, Computer Graphics and Visualization.

questions_and_answers.question: What are Dr. KARUNA PANDIT's educational qualifications?
questions_and_answers.answer: Dr. KARUNA PANDIT holds a Ph.D. from NITK, Surathkal in 2014, an M.Tech from NITK, Surathkal in 1999, and an M.Sc from Mangalore University in 1984.

questions_and_answers.question: What is Dr. KARUNA PANDIT's past experience?
questions_and_answers.answer: Dr. KARUNA PANDIT has served in various positions at NMAM Institute of Technology from Lecturer to Professor, including roles such as Lecturer, Senior Lecturer, Assistant Professor, Associate Professor, and HOD. Their tenure spans from September 1987 to the present.

questions_and_answers.question: What are Dr. KARUNA PANDIT's areas of interest?
questions_and_answers.answer: Dr. KARUNA PANDIT's areas of interest include Cryptography and Random number Generation.

questions_and_answers.question: What are Dr. KARUNA PANDIT's departmental responsibilities?
questions_and_answers.answer: Dr. KARUNA PANDIT serves as the NAAC Coordinator.

questions_and_answers.question: What professional memberships does Dr. KARUNA PANDIT have?
questions_and_answers.answer: Dr. KARUNA PANDIT is a Life Member of Indian Society for Technical Education, Life Member of Indian Society of Systems for Science And Engineering, and a Life member of Cryptology Research Society of India.

questions_and_answers.question: What subjects has Dr. KARUNA PANDIT handled?
questions_and_answers.answer: Dr. KARUNA PANDIT has handled subjects such as Probability, Statistics and Queuing, Discrete Mathematical Structure, Operation Research, C programming, Object oriented Programming with C++, Operating Systems, Design and Analysis of Algorithms, System Simulation and Modelling, Cryptography, and Network Security.

questions_and_answers.question: What are Dr. KARTHIK PAI B. H.'s educational qualifications?
questions_and_answers.answer: Dr. KARTHIK PAI B. H. holds a Ph.D. in Computer Science & Engineering from VTU, Belgaum in 2018, an M. Tech. in Computer Science & Engineering from VTU, Belgaum in 2003, and a B.E. in Computer Science & Engineering from Karnatak University, Dharwad in 1998.

questions_and_answers.question: What is Dr. KARTHIK PAI B. H.'s past experience?
questions_and_answers.answer: Dr. KARTHIK PAI B. H. has served as a Lecturer in the Dept. of CSE at KVG College of Engineering, Sullia from 14/06/1999 to 17/09/1999, a Lecturer in the Dept. of CSE at TMAPP, Manipal from 20/09/1999 to 30/09/2000, and as an Assistant Professor/Associate Professor in the Dept. of ISE at NMAMIT from 2000 to 2017. They have been serving as a Professor in the Dept. of ISE at NMAMIT since 2018.

questions_and_answers.question: What are Dr. KARTHIK PAI B. H.'s areas of interest?
questions_and_answers.answer: Dr. KARTHIK PAI B. H.'s areas of interest include Software Engineering, Computer Networks, Advanced Computer Architecture, and Networks and Security.

questions_and_answers.question: What are Dr. KARTHIK PAI B. H.'s departmental responsibilities?
questions_and_answers.answer: Dr. KARTHIK PAI B. H. serves as the Internal ISO Coordinator.

questions_and_answers.question: What professional memberships does Dr. KARTHIK PAI B. H. have?
questions_and_answers.answer: Dr. KARTHIK PAI B. H. is a Member of the Indian Society for Technical Education.

questions_and_answers.question: What subjects has Dr. KARTHIK PAI B. H. handled?
questions_and_answers.answer: Dr. KARTHIK PAI B. H. has handled subjects such as Advanced Computer Architecture, Software Engineering, Cloud Infrastructure & Services, Computer Networks, Design Thinking, Intrusion Detection Systems, Supply Chain Management and ERP, Internet of Things, Data Communication, Computer Organization and Architecture, Unix & Shell Programming, Operating Systems, Fundamentals of Cyber Security, and Industrial Engineering Management.

questions_and_answers.question: What are Dr. USHA DIVAKARLA's educational qualifications?
questions_and_answers.answer: B.E (2000) in Computer Science and Engineering (CSE) from Bangalore University, Kalpataru Institute of Technology, Tiptur. M.Tech (2006) in Computer Science and Engineering (CSE) from Maharshi Dayanand University, Haryana, YMCA Engineering College, Faridabad. Ph.D (2018) in Trust Management in Cloud Computing from NITK Surathkal.

questions_and_answers.question: Where has Dr. USHA DIVAKARLA worked in the past?
questions_and_answers.answer: Dr. USHA DIVAKARLA has worked at St Joseph Engineering College, Vamajoor, Mangalore, Karnataka, India from July 2018 to Dec 2020. questions_and_answers.question: What achievements has Dr. JASON ELROY MARTIS accomplished?
questions_and_answers.answer: Dr. JASON ELROY MARTIS was nominated for the 'Young Scientist Award' under the International Research and Academic Excellence Awards 2021 held by the 9th International Online Conference on Recent Innovative Research. They were also identified as a Technical Program Committee member for the 2020 Second International Conference on Soft Computing and its Engineering Applications. Additionally, Dr. JASON ELROY MARTIS received appreciation for the in-house development of a Smart Classroom device installed at LH500 classroom 5th Floor APJ Block NMAMIT, and received KCST Funding for creating a framework for the 'Automatic Classification of Bacterial Clusters using Transfer Learning' which is currently deployed in-house in their Deep Learning Server at NMAMIT. They also won 9th Place in WHO Product Development for Vaccines Advisory Competition 2019 for assisting in the development of a cost-effective IoT sensor in Vaccine Logistics Management.

She has been involved in organizing various workshops and events. Her project named 'Smart Waste Management System' was selected for funding by KSCST in the year 2016-17. She has also been recognized as a BRONZE partner faculty under the Inspire-The Campus Connect Faculty Partnership Model in the year 2018.

questions_and_answers.question: What are Ms. ALAKA ANANTH's educational qualifications?
questions_and_answers.answer: Ms. ALAKA ANANTH is currently pursuing a Ph.D. She holds an M.Tech(Research) in Computer Science and Engineering from NITK Surathkal (2015) and a B.E in Computer Science and Engineering from JNNCE, Shivamogga (VTU) (2012).

questions_and_answers.question: What is Ms. ALAKA ANANTH's past experience?
questions_and_answers.answer: Ms. ALAKA ANANTH has worked as a Lecturer at NIE, Mysore from 30th July 2014 to 20th June 2017 and as an Assistant Lecturer at NITK, Surathkal from 21st July 2017 to 14th May 2018.

questions_and_answers.question: What are Ms. ALAKA ANANTH's areas of interest?
questions_and_answers.answer: Ms. ALAKA ANANTH's areas of interest include Cloud Computing, Data Structures and Algorithms, Computer Networks, and Natural Language Processing.

questions_and_answers.question: What is Ms. ALAKA ANANTH's achievement?
questions_and_answers.answer: Ms. ALAKA ANANTH has participated in various events including chess tournaments, international conferences, workshops, and faculty development programs. She organized a Faculty Development Program (FDP) titled 'Quality research empowered by R and LATEX' (QuaRTEX) in June 2016 at NIE, Mysuru.

questions_and_answers.question: What are Ms. ALAKA ANANTH's departmental responsibilities?
questions_and_answers.answer: Ms. ALAKA ANANTH's departmental responsibilities include being the NSS Coordinator, Consultancy Project In-charge, Students Achievements Coordinator, Research Co-coordinator, Course File incharge, VISTA Co-coordinator, and Students Achievements Coordinator.

questions_and_answers.question: What professional memberships does Ms. ALAKA ANANTH hold?
questions_and_answers.answer: Ms. ALAKA ANANTH is a member of IFERP.

questions_and_answers.answer: Ms. ALAKA ANANTH has handled subjects such as Computer Concepts and C Programming, Data Structures using C, Probability Modelling and Simulation for Computer Science, Computer Graphics and Visualization, Discrete Mathematical Structures, Operating System, Digital System Design, Cloud Computing, Information Storage Management, Design and Analysis of Algorithms, and Web Services.

questions_and_answers.answer: Ms. ALAKA ANANTH has participated in workshops on PLC Based Programming and Automation, Understanding our adolescents, Suicide Prevention and Introduction to Therapeutic Counselling for Teachers & administrators in Higher Education, Data Science with Machine Learning and Python using Jupyter Notebook IDE, NPTEL Certification Programming with C++, Coursera Certification for various courses, NVIDIA DLI Certificate, AICTE Incorporating Universal Human Values in Education, FDP on Mobile App Development and Artificial Intelligence with MIT App Inventor, Online Webinar Series on Cyber Security, Workshop on Natural Language Processing and Deep Learning Techniques, and more.

questions_and_answers.question: What additional information is available about Ms. ALAKA ANANTH?
questions_and_answers.answer: Ms. ALAKA ANANTH has been a resource person for a technical talk and demonstration on 'Report writing using LATEX' organized by ISTE student chapter. She has also received grants under various schemes and organized workshops.

questions_and_answers.question: What are Ms. PREETHI SALIAN K's educational qualifications?
questions_and_answers.answer: Ms. PREETHI SALIAN K holds an M.Tech in Computer Science & Engineering from NMAMIT, Nitte (VTU, Belgavi) in 2014 and a B.E in Computer Science and Engineering from St. Joseph Engineering College, Vamanjoor (VTU, Belgavi) in 2011. She is currently pursuing a Ph.D.

questions_and_answers.question: What is Ms. PREETHI SALIAN K's past experience?
questions_and_answers.answer: Ms. PREETHI SALIAN K worked as an Assistant Professor Gd-II in the Dept. of ISE, NMAMIT, Nitte from 2nd September 2021. Previously, she served as an Assistant Professor in the Department of Computer Science & Engineering at Srinivas University College of Engineering and Technology, Mukka, from July 2014 to July 2021, and as a Lecturer in the Department of Computer Science & Engineering at St. Joseph Engineering College, Vamanjoor from October 2011 to June 2012.

questions_and_answers.answer: Ms. PREETHI SALIAN K's areas of interest include Machine Learning, Deep Learning, Digital Image Processing, and Computer Vision.

questions_and_answers.question: What is Ms. PREETHI SALIAN K's achievement?
questions_and_answers.answer: Ms. PREETHI SALIAN K was awarded a gold medal for scoring the highest marks in the MTech (CSE) course from NMAMIT, Nitte during the period 2012-2014.

questions_and_answers.question: What are Ms. PREETHI SALIAN K's departmental responsibilities?
